data.lyric:
[ti:ivy (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]ivy (Explicit) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:01.17]Lyrics by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:02.35]Composed by：Aaron Dessner/Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:03.52]How's one to know
[00:05.92]I'd meet you where the spirit meets the bones
[00:09.53]In a faith forgotten land
[00:14.14]In from the snow
[00:16.62]Your touch brought forth an incandescent glow
[00:20.76]Tarnished but so grand
[00:24.53]And the old widow goes to the stone every day
[00:28.63]But I don't I just sit here and wait
[00:31.58]Grieving for the living
[00:35.21]Oh godd**n
[00:38.04]My pain fits in the palm of your freezing hand
[00:42.42]Taking mine but it's been promised to another
[00:46.51]Oh I can't
[00:49.14]Stop you putting roots in my dreamland
[00:52.87]My house of stone your ivy grows
[00:55.59]And now I'm covered in you
[01:08.21]I wish to know
[01:10.57]The fatal flaw that makes you long to be
[01:14.40]Magnificently cursed
[01:18.83]He's in the room
[01:21.37]Your opal eyes are all I wish to see
[01:25.44]He wants what's only yours
[01:29.20]Oh godd**n
[01:31.98]My pain fits in the palm of your freezing hand
[01:36.18]Taking mine but it's been promised to another
[01:40.49]Oh I can't
[01:43.01]Stop you putting roots in my dreamland
[01:46.76]My house of stone your ivy grows
[01:49.67]And now I'm covered
[01:51.27]Clover blooms in the fields
[01:53.89]Spring breaks loose the time is near
[01:57.63]But what would he do if he found us out
[02:01.97]Crescent moon coast is clear
[02:04.62]Spring breaks loose but so does fear
[02:08.19]He's gonna burn this house to the ground
[02:12.89]How's one to know
[02:15.37]I'd live and die for moments that we stole
[02:19.31]On begged and borrowed time
[02:23.23]So tell me to run
[02:26.07]Or dare to sit and watch what we'll become
[02:30.15]And drink my husband's wine
[02:33.74]Oh godd**n
[02:36.72]My pain fits in the palm of your freezing hand
[02:41.07]Taking mine but it's been promised to another
[02:45.08]Oh I can't
[02:47.79]Stop you putting roots in my dreamland
[02:51.44]My house of stone your ivy grows
[02:54.32]And now I'm covered in you
[03:00.43]And I'm covered in you
[03:06.43]So yeah it's a fire
[03:09.02]It's a godd**n blaze in the dark
[03:11.20]And you started it
[03:13.84]You started it
[03:17.19]So yeah it's a war
[03:19.68]It's the godd**n fight of my life
[03:21.77]And you started it
[03:24.55]You started it
[03:27.93]Oh I can't
[03:30.98]Stop you putting roots in my dreamland
[03:34.75]My house of stone your ivy grows
[03:37.54]And now I'm covered in you
[03:43.42]
[03:44.77]In you
[03:53.21]
[03:53.85]Now I'm covered in you
[03:59.11]
[04:00.41]In you
data.trans:
[ti:ivy (Explicit)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:evermore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.17]//
[00:02.34]//
[00:03.52]怎会有人知道
[00:05.92]我愿在灵骨相遇的地方 与你相会
[00:09.53]在这信仰被遗忘的土地上
[00:14.14]在漫天飞雪中
[00:16.62]你的怀抱带来了炽热的光芒
[00:20.76]一片黯淡 却又无比辉煌
[00:24.53]年迈的寡妇每天都会去往墓碑旁
[00:28.63]但我不会 我就坐在这里等候
[00:31.58]为生者哀婉
[00:35.21]我的老天
[00:38.04]你冰冷的手正好可以治愈我的痛苦
[00:42.42]握着我的手 可我的心已许诺给他人
[00:46.51]我无法
[00:49.14]阻止你在我的梦境中生根发芽
[00:52.87]我的石头房屋 爬满了你的常春藤
[00:55.59]现在我已被你彻底占据
[01:08.21]我想知道
[01:10.57]是什么样的致命缺陷 让你如此渴望
[01:14.40]被深深诅咒
[01:18.83]他在我身旁
[01:21.37]可我想看的 只有你神采奕奕的眼眸
[01:25.44]他想拥有只属于你的一切
[01:29.20]我的老天
[01:31.98]你冰冷的手正好可以治愈我的痛苦
[01:36.18]握着我的手 可我的心已许诺给他人
[01:40.49]我无法
[01:43.01]阻止你在我的梦境中生根发芽
[01:46.76]我的石头房屋 爬满了你的常春藤
[01:49.67]现在我被你占据
[01:51.27]三叶草在田野中盛放
[01:53.89]绿意盎然 春天即将到来
[01:57.63]如果他发现了我们的事 他会做什么
[02:01.97]新月高悬 晴朗海岸
[02:04.62]春天即将到来 但是恐惧也随之而来
[02:08.19]他会将这座房子夷为平地
[02:12.89]怎会有人知道
[02:15.37]为了与你共度片刻 我愿不顾一切
[02:19.31]分秒必争哪怕只是片刻欢愉
[02:23.23]所以 告诉我 要么逃离
[02:26.07]要么静坐在此 看看我们会变成什么模样
[02:30.15]喝着我丈夫的红酒
[02:33.74]我的老天
[02:36.72]你冰冷的手正好可以治愈我的痛苦
[02:41.07]握着我的手 可我的心已许诺给他人
[02:45.08]我无法
[02:47.79]阻止你在我的梦境中生根发芽
[02:51.44]我的石头房屋 爬满了你的常春藤
[02:54.32]现在我已被你彻底占据
[03:00.43]我被你彻底占据
[03:06.43]所以 这就像一场烈火
[03:09.02]在黑暗中熊熊燃烧着
[03:11.20]而你是纵火者
[03:13.84]而你是纵火者
[03:17.19]所以 这就像一场战争
[03:19.68]与我的命运息息相关
[03:21.77]而你是战争发起者
[03:24.55]而你是战争发起者
[03:27.93]我无法
[03:30.98]阻止你在我的梦境中生根发芽
[03:34.75]我的石头房屋 爬满了你的常春藤
[03:37.54]现在我已被你彻底占据
[03:43.42]
[03:44.77]被你占据
[03:53.21]
[03:53.85]现在我被你彻底占据
[03:59.11]
[04:00.41]被你占据
